摍字的基本解释

摍
suō
抽；引。

摍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［suō］
［《廣韻》所六切，入屋，生。］
亦作“摍1”。亦作“1”。“缩1”的繁体字。
(1)捆扎。
(2)退。
(3)短。
(4)收敛；收缩。
(5)亏欠，不足。
(6)节省，减缩。参见“縮衣節食”。
(7)纵；直。《礼记·檀弓上》：“古者冠縮縫，今也衡縫。”郑玄注：“縮，縱也。”《孟子·公孙丑上》：“自反而不縮，雖褐寬博，吾不惴焉。”杨伯峻注：“《檀弓》以'縮''衡'對言，爲'横直'之'直'；此則爲'曲直'之'直'。”参见“縮俎”。一说，縮读为“蹙”。蹙，近。
(8)取。
(9)滤酒去渣。参见“縮酌”。
(10)姓。战国时有缩高。见《战国策·魏策四》。
[②]［sù］
“缩2”的繁体字。
见“縮2砂蔤”。

摍字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　摍； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页449第13
【唐韻】【集韻】?所六切，音縮。【說文】蹴引他。　又【廣韻】抽也。【詩·小雅·成是南箕傳】放乎旦而蒸盡，縮屋而繼之。【釋文】縮又作?。【疏】然薪薪盡，乃抽取屋草，以繼之也。本作?。亦作?。

摍字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
摍字的起名意思

暂无。

摍
Basic explanation of words
摍
suō
Pumped; cited.
摍
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［suō］
[Six cuts in "Guangyun", entering the house, giving birth. ]
Also known as "摍1". Also called "1". Traditional Chinese characters for "abbreviated 1".
(1) Bundling.
(2) Withdrawal.
(3) Short.
(4) Convergence; shrinkage.
(5) Insufficient and deficient.
(6) Save and shrink. See "shrinking clothes on a diet".
(7) Vertical; straight. "Book of Rites·Tan Gongshang": "The ancient crowns shrink and seam, but now they are evenly seamed." Zheng Xuan's note: "Shrink, and vertical." , I’m not worried.” Yang Bojun’s note: “Tan Gong uses the dialect of “Shu” Heng”, which is the “straight” of “Horizontal”; this is the “Straight” of “Curved straight”.” See “Short” ". In one word, it is abbreviated as "蹙". Flop, near.
(8) Take.
(9) Filter the wine to remove residue. See "shrinking".
(10) Last name. The height was reduced during the Warring States Period. See "Warring States Policy·Wei Ce IV".
[②]［sù］
Traditional Chinese characters for "abstract 2".
See "Shrink 2 sand rind".
摍
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　摍; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 449 13
【Tang Yun】【Ji Yun】? All six cuts, abbreviated. 【Said the text】Quickly lead him.　[Guangyun] Pumping again. [Poetry·Xiaoya·Chengshi Nanji Biography] Let it go until it is steamed, shrink the house and continue. [Explanation] Abbreviated again?. [Sparse] Once the salary is exhausted, the house grass is drawn, and then it can be followed. This work?. Also for?.

摍
Name meaning
Nothing.
sù
гл. втягивать; втаскивать
摍乱 вовлекать в смуту
